name: God Warz: Battle Ground
description:
Defeat the monsters and save the world with Gods!
Now the God wars begin!

-One-touch battle system : Tap the screen at the appropriate time!
-Simple and Easy control
-Raid bosses system : mobilize all your cards to defeat the bosses!
-Supports real-time PVP
-More than 120 playable cards with 5 ranks
-Over 40 monsters with unique different skills
-Powerful over 30 bosses
-30 stages : save the whole world!
-Gacha system : Get rare cards!
-Level up system : Increase your cards!
